Search.Query: select ( Q_COLUMN_NAMES ) from Q_TABLE_NAME WHERE Q_CONDITIONS;

CreateTable.Query: create table Q_TABLE_NAME (ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY);

AddColumn.Query: alter table Q_TABLE_NAME ADD Q_COLUMN_NAME Q_COLUMN_TYPE;

DropColumn.Query: alter table Q_TABLE_NAME DROP column Q_COLUMN_NAME;

InsertItem.Query: insert into Q_TABLE_NAME ( Q_COLUMN_NAMES ) values ( Q_COLUMN_VALUES );

UpdateItem.Query: update Q_TABLE_NAME set SET_VALUES where Q_CONDITIONS;
